title: If any complaint is received in respect of any on-going work for which development permission has been granted, he should take the cognizance of the said compliant and do the needful within 15 days
clause_text: If any complaint is received in respect of any on-going work for which development permission has been granted, he should take the cognizance of the said compliant and do the needful within 15 days.
section: Duties and Responsibilities of Geotechnical Engineer :
